proposal: Diving into the world of LEBRON - LRMR Ventures, it's clear you're all about expanding horizons and managing a diverse portfolio. With 113 holders in the ETH network, congrats on building a solid community! 🎉 If you're looking to add a new layer of engagement, why not let your community create their own DEX or run a blockchain lottery? It's all about giving power back to the people, after all. Let's chat if you're up for exploring these tools.
